Package org.red5.server.api

Interface Summary
IAttributeStore Base interface for all API objects with attributes
IBroadcastStream Extends stream to add methods for broadcast streaming.
ICall Object representing a methods call.
IClient The client object represents a single client.
IClientRegistry Provides a registry of client objects.
IConnection The connection object.
IContext The current context, this object basically wraps the spring context or in the case of the .Net version, any similar system.
IEasyAppHandler  
IMappingStrategy This interface encapsulates the mapping strategy used by the context.
IOnDemandStream Extends stream to add methods for on demand access.
IScope The Scope Object.
IScopeAuth Scope Auth controls actions performed against a scope object Gives fine grained control over what actions can be performed with the can* methods.
IScopeHandler The Scope Handler controls actions performed against a scope object, and also is notified of all events.
IScopeResolver Resolve the scope given a host and path
IServiceInvoker Invoke a call against a context
ISharedObject Serverside access to shared objects.
IStream Base interface for stream objects.
 

Class Summary
Red5 Utility class for accessing red5 API objects.
ScopeUtils Collection of utils for working with scopes
